meanings.definition: A tropical plant of the dogbane family, known for its medicinal properties.
meanings.sent1: The rauwolfias in the garden are thriving under the warm sun.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe in the healing power of rauwolfias.
meanings.sent3: The rauwolfias in the garden seem to be the doctors of the plant world.
meanings.sent4: Herbalists see rauwolfias as nature's medicine cabinet.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the rauwolfias make them stand out among other plants.

meanings.definition: The dried roots of the rauwolfia plant, used in traditional medicine.
meanings.sent1: Grandma brewed a tea using rauwolfias to help with her cough.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of rauwolfias filled the room as the roots simmered.
meanings.sent3: The rauwolfias in the cupboard looked like ancient treasures.
meanings.sent4: The essence of rauwolfias lingered in the air, comforting and familiar.
meanings.sent5: The healing power of rauwolfias has been passed down through generations.

meanings.definition: A type of alkaloid compound found in rauwolfia plants, used in pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the effects of rauwolfias on the human body.
meanings.sent2: Pharmaceutical companies extract rauwolfias for various medications.
meanings.sent3: The rauwolfias in the lab were busy creating new medicines.
meanings.sent4: The alkaloid compound in rauwolfias is a key ingredient in many drugs.
meanings.sent5: Doctors rely on the purity of rauwolfias for effective treatments.
